TitlePage.Abstract: This is a manual for an &autgps; package, implementing in &GAP; basic functions and algorithms for groups generated by finite automata, contracting groups.

TitlePage.Colophon: The project was originally started in 2000 mostly for personal use. It was gradually expadnig during consequent years, including both addition of new algorithms and simplification of user interface. It was used in the process of classification of groups generated by $3$-state automata over 2-letter alphabet.
